### USAGE ###
>        /quota
>        /master/quota

### TL;DR; ###
Sets quota for a role.

### DESCRIPTION ###
POST: Validates the request body as JSON
 and sets quota for a role.


### AUTHENTICATION ###
This endpoint requires authentication iff HTTP authentication is
enabled.
